scripts.setup:ml: deactivate 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf venv venv311 && /opt/homebrew/opt/python@3.11/bin/python3.11 -m venv venv311 && source venv311/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:ml" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.restart: npm run setup:ml && npm run kill:ports || true && npm run dev
scripts.build: tsc && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.start-all: npm run kill:ports || true && echo 'Starting EquiHome TFL System...' && npm run dev
